example.eg: Your assumptions about product quality are only based on the high price of the goods.
example.egtrans: 你关于产品质量的假定只不过是基于该产品的高昂价格。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 假定, 推断, 臆断

example.eg: The policy failed because the assumptions proved to be wrong.
example.egtrans: 政策失败了，因为所有推测都被证明是谬误。

example.eg: His assumption of responsibility for the kids caused him financial stress.
example.egtrans: 他要承担照顾孩子的责任，有经济压力。
